statements: DELETE FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND conversion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM EmailCampaignConversion WHERE conversion_type = 'purchase' AND conversion_value > 1000;
DELETE FROM campaign_conversions WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND conversion_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM campaign_roi WHERE email_campaign_id = 3 AND roi < 0.5;
DELETE FROM conversions WHERE amount > 500 AND conversion_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
